original_title: Byron Cage: Live at the Apollo: The Proclamation
overview: Gospel music's "Prince of Praise" raises his voice to the rafters at Harlem's famed Apollo Theater in this inspiring concert. Performing a rousing set of gospel, Byron Cage is joined by rising sensation Kim Burrell and R&B star Dave Hollister. Produced by the Grammy-nominated trio PAJAM, the show includes such soul-stirring songs as "I've Got a Reason," "When He Comes Back" and "Your Spirit."
title: Byron Cage: Live at the Apollo: The Proclamation
